about_the_game:
SKUF SIMULATOR is a cooperative simulator of real life skuf, where you and your friends can take on the role of a skuf.


In the game, you will be able to:

  • Become the realest skuf and take on the role of a meme.
  • Participate in various fun and absurd mini-games.
  • Compete with friends in a variety of events.

SKUF SIMULATOR is the perfect game for those who love memes, fun, and good vibes.

Features:

  • Cooperative mode for 4 players.
  • Various mini-games and contests.
  • Realistic graphics.
  • Game mechanics that will not let you and your friends get bored.

If you are interested in SKUF SIMULATOR, then add it to your wishlist now and get ready to become a real skuf! And if you are already a skuf, then we are glad about that!
detailed_description:
ONLY UP: SKIBIDI TOGETHER


About the Game

SKUF SIMULATOR is a cooperative simulator of real life skuf, where you and your friends can take on the role of a skuf.


In the game, you will be able to:

  • Become the realest skuf and take on the role of a meme.
  • Participate in various fun and absurd mini-games.
  • Compete with friends in a variety of events.

SKUF SIMULATOR is the perfect game for those who love memes, fun, and good vibes.

Features:

  • Cooperative mode for 4 players.
  • Various mini-games and contests.
  • Realistic graphics.
  • Game mechanics that will not let you and your friends get bored.

If you are interested in SKUF SIMULATOR, then add it to your wishlist now and get ready to become a real skuf! And if you are already a skuf, then we are glad about that!
name: SKUF SIMULATOR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 1GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4GHz Quad-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 3GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: SKUF SIMULATOR is a cooperative, humorous simulator of real life skuf, based on a popular meme. In the game, you and your friends can take on the role of a skuf and participate in various fun and absurd mini-games and contests.
